dtliExcerpt: Helen J Shen and Darren Criss in 'Maybe Happy Ending' on Broadway Matthew Murphy and Evan Zimmerman It takes a special type of theatrical talent, one loaded with heart and wit and insight, to imbue something that looks like an Apple MagSafe iPhone Charger with more romantic appeal than a decade’s worth of Valentines Day chocolates, but that’s just what the creators and performers of the delightful musical Maybe Happy Ending have achieved.
